name: Org-Mode - dark
description:
* especially for the manual
* darkens the Org-Mode site
* lightens the font colors for contrast
* leaves the link and heading colors as they are
* has different-colored backgrounds for different sections
* has subtle, fancy borders for examples and lisp
additional_info:
Version .6 gives second-level headings a blurry text shadow to improve legibility.

Version 0.5 does the following:
* darkens default font color
* limits the maximum width of text to simplify reading
* justifies text to make lines end at the same point
* reverses the color of the code section shadows (Now, they appear to glow.)
* adapts to the FAQ
* makes all of the code section borders one unified light color (since they had less contrast on some pages)
* lightens the second-level headings
* makes sure all the third-level headings are the original color
